author: mariusvanderwijden
content: The snapshot is only for 128 states, the trie is by default for 10.000 blocks. You can do traces etc on the trie. If you do reorgs larger than 128, you need to rebuild the snapshot. If you need state beyond 10k blocks, you need to full sync and run an archive node

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: If you want to trace stuff older than 128 blocks, you need to specify reexec in your trace command. There is documentation for that on thr website
